entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing near noon. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
